mapper.select: select a.*, m.t_name from ((select * from board where b_type='N' order by bidx desc limit 0,3) union all (select * from board where b_type='G' order by bidx desc limit #{rowStartBoard},#{pageNumBoard} ))as a inner join afps_member as m on a.tidx = m.tidx where a.delyn='N'
select b.*, m.t_name from board as b inner join afps_member as m on b.tidx = m.tidx where b.delyn = 'N' order by b.b_type desc, b.bidx desc limit #{pageStart},10

select count(b.bidx) from board as b where 1=1
and b.bidx > 0 and b.delyn='N'

if.if: AND b.tidx IN ( select m.tidx from afps_member as m where 1=1 and m.t_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') and m.delyn='N' )

mapper.select: select b.*, m.t_name from board as b inner join afps_member as m on b.tidx = m.tidx where bidx=#{bidx}

select a.*, m.t_name from (select * from board as b order by b.b_type desc, b.bidx desc limit 0,12 )as a inner join afps_member as m on a.tidx = m.tidx where a.delyn='N' and a.b_writedate between date_format(#{search1}, '%y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{search2}, '%y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET B_HIT = B_HIT+1 WHERE BIDX = #{bidx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD( B_TYPE, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_WRITEDATE, B_HIT, DELYN, TIDX ) VALUES( #{b_type}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, now(), 0, 'N', #{tidx} )
INSERT INTO FILE_INFO( F_TYPE, F_ORG_FILE_NAME, F_STORED_FILE_NAME, F_FILE_SIZE, DELYN, BIDX )VALUES( #{F_TYPE}, #{ORG_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE}, 'N', #{bidx} )
